skill.s1.name: Passionate Singing
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fcff37][b]Electric DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.

If an ally has [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip], they will deal an additional [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fcff37][b]Electric DMG[/b][/color] based on their [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] to the main target.
skill.s2.name: Improvised Solo
skill.s2.description: Apply [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] to an ally.

Increase [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] of the ally with [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] by [color=#fcff37][b]24.0%[/b][/color] of Chord's [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 3 turns.
Only one [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] can exists at a time.
skill.s3.name: Finale : Range Unleash
skill.s3.description: Immediately activate the [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] skill of an ally while increasing the [color=#fcff37][b]DMG[/b][/color] of this [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
The [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] activated through this skill will not count towards the character's [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] cooldown.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: All allies gain [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} DMG Bonus[/b][/color] for 4 actions and after acts they recover [color=#fcff37][b]10.0% HIGHLIGHT energy[/b][/color].
skill.p1.name: Stress
skill.p1.description: When an ally activate their [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color], increases their [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 1 turn.

If that ally has [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] the effect is increased by [b][color=#fcff37]1.5[/color][color=#ffdd6e]*[/color][/b]
skill.p2.name: Sweep Picking
skill.p2.description: When an ally activate their [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color], Chord immediately heals the ally with the lowest [color=#fcff37][b]HP[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} [color=#ffdd6e]+[/color] {skill_data}[/b][/color] of Chord's [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color]
awareness.a0.name: My Light
awareness.a0.description: When entering battle, [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] has 1 turn cooldown.

Each time [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] is used, is permanently increases Chord's [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]20.0%[/b][/color] up to [color=#fcff37][b]2[/b][/color] stacks.
Afterwards, [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] cooldown permanently increases by 1 turn, up to 3 turns.
awareness.a1.name: Greet My Dawn Star
awareness.a1.description: When entering battle, automatically apply [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] to an ally, prioritizing the ally with the highest [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] in [color=#ffd800][b]ST[/b][/color] or [color=#ffd800][b]AOE[/b][/color] role, and the ally with [tooltip character=chord id=loyal_listener][color=#ffdd6e][u][b][Loyal Listener][/b][/u][/color][/tooltip] gains [color=#fcff37][b]15.0% CR[/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Lonely Shimmers
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s1][color=#ffd800][b][u][Passionate Singing][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a3.name: Mr. Light
awareness.a3.description: When using [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on an ally, also increases that ally's [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]30.0%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
awareness.a4.name: Painted My Scenes
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s2][color=#ffd800][b][u][Improvised Solo][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=hl][color=#ffd800][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a5.name: Change My Life
awareness.a5.description: [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] Improvement : Increases the duration of [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT Energy Recovery[/b][/color] and [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] to 6 actions.
The [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] is increased to [color=#fcff37][b]60.0%[/b][/color] and reduces [color=#fcff37][b]HIGHLIGHT[/b][/color] cooldown of other allies by 1 turn.
awareness.a6.name: My Mr. Right
awareness.a6.description: When entering battle, immediately unlock [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref].
The cooldown of [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] is permanently reduced by 1 turn, with a maximum cooldown of 2 turns.

After [ref=s3][color=#ffd800][b][u][Finale : Range Unleash][/u][/b][/color][/ref] is used, permanently increases allies [color=#fcff37][b]DMG Bonus[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]15.0%[/b][/color] up to [color=#fcff37][b]2[/b][/color] stacks.
